law.catch_line: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum....

text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum.
The Board sets the times and places of its meetings.

A member of the Board:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Board; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
